overview: The expedition for the Kiamichi beast  up into the mountains was a tedious journey. For over 200 years the Kiamichi beast has roamed Arkansas, the Indians say he would raid the camp and steal the children. Now adays the locals are afraid to enter the woods at night. tagline: The Kiamichi Beast has terrorized Oklahoma for over 100 years.
title: The Kiamichi Beast Expedition
